definition: double/twice/simultaneous/holding two or more (official) posts at the same time

sentences.english: Cash-starved companies welcome Chinese investment or acquisition offers.
sentences.chinese: 急需資金的公司歡迎中國的投資或兼併提議。

sentences.english: We made progress in enterprise mergers and reorganizations.
sentences.chinese: 企業兼併重組取得新進展。

sentences.english: The big company merged various small businesses.
sentences.chinese: 那家大公司兼併了多家小商行。

sentences.english: Further progress was made in mergers and reorganization in key industries.
sentences.chinese: 重點行業兼併重組取得新進展。

sentences.english: For the first time, it's poised to surpass both Goldman Sachs and Morgan Stanley in the lucrative M&A business.
sentences.chinese: 在兼併重組業務方面上它超過了高盛和摩根士丹利。

sentences.english: Acquistions of smaller companies by bigger companies are a fact of the business world.
sentences.chinese: 較大公司兼併較小公司是商業界中的事實。

sentences.english: Picture-taking is a technique both for annexing the objective world and for expressing the singular self.
sentences.chinese: 照相是一種既兼併客觀世界，又表達獨特自我的技術。

sentences.english: The small firms were absorbed into large cartels.
sentences.chinese: 這些小公司被大企業聯盟兼併了。

sentences.english: Some consulting firms also offer computer programs to help mergers succeed.
sentences.chinese: 一些諮詢公司還提供電腦程式，以幫助兼併成功。

sentences.english: Second, we will encourage mergers and reorganization of enterprises.
sentences.chinese: 二是促進企業兼併重組。

sentences.english: This sugar factory is one of the recent acquisitions of the company.
sentences.chinese: 這家糖廠是公司最近兼併的廠家之一。

sentences.english: The Galactic Empire inherited the technological achievements of both warring factions of the Clone Wars.
sentences.chinese: 銀河帝國兼併了克隆人戰爭交戰雙方的技術成果。

sentences.english: Land annexation was a persistent ailment of the Ancient China.
sentences.chinese: 土地兼併是古代中國的一個頑症。

sentences.english: The development of Chinese enterprises has been entered into the new period of developing by the annex and recombination.
sentences.chinese: 中國企業的發展已進入了依靠兼併重組壯大的新時期。

sentences.english: In 2010, the company acquired Holland Darwin Mechanical and Electric Corporation.
sentences.chinese: 去年成功兼併了荷蘭達爾文機電公司。

sentences.english: Shanxi coal mine massive mergers and acquisitions in real terms in step by step movement.
sentences.chinese: 聲勢浩大的山西煤礦兼併重組運動邁出實質一步。

definition: Self-Strengthening Movement (period of reforms in China c 1861-1894), also named 自強運動|自强运动
many things waiting to be done (idiom)/a thousand things to do
agricultural worker/abbr. for 農業工人|农业工人/peasant and worker (in Marxism)
"the four classes" of ancient China, i.e. scholars, farmers, artisans, and merchants
peer competition/to function as rivals/to make claims as an equal
to ride to take up an official appointment (idiom); to take on a job with alacrity/to undertake a task
